awards:
第46届安锡国际动画节(2024)
　　特别奖 安锡城市奖(提名) 尼古拉斯·皮雷特

director.name: 尼古拉斯·皮雷特 Nicolas Piret

introduction: Two campers follow their clothes as they float away on a stream in the Belgian Ardennes. Along their journey through nature, they observe the various ways that people disturb the peace. Illustrator-animator Nicolas Piret has an incredible eye for detail and uses only a single sheet of paper to tell this story. With this impressively meticulous approach, he deploys a playful form of storytelling.源自：https://iffr.com/en/iffr/2024/films/silent-panorama
